name: Skeleboi
description:
This game was created for a small jam between two other friends. The rules were that the games had to use a selected art pack and follow a Halloween theme. The time limit was only 72 hours so it was quite a challenging project.

The art pack reminded me a lot of top-down Zelda games so I used that as inspiration and tried to fit it into a Metroidvania game.

I was probably too over ambitious with the project as I planned more rooms and a boss fight at the end but, I still think I did well to get together what I have done. 

I've linked below the other entered games in the competition.

https://sirnewtz.itch.io/poor-monster - https://mr44matthew.itch.io/the-cowardly-knight
